message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you a chance to purchase this truly unique product.  I value it highly, but I'm willing to open negotiations at $1,500,000.  I believe its worth to you will be significant.
Thank you for considering my offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can't afford such a high price. I am willing to offer $800,000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $800,000 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $1,250,000?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I'm still not able to meet the price. I would like to offer $1,000,000 for the product.
